evidence.claim: Allegheny Health Network emphasizes HIPAA compliance in their medical equipment services.
The company mentions using X12 EDI standards for healthcare transactions in their operational guidelines.
They adhere to FHIR standards as part of their interoperability strategy for health data exchange.
Integration of HL7 protocols is highlighted in their case studies for electronic health record management.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found supporting use of X12 or clearinghouse services.
